body_html:
Same problem here. Log:

2018-09-27 10:02:39.079409: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:352] Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED
2018-09-27 10:02:39.079563: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:360] Possibly insufficient driver version: 396.26.0

Have I written custom code: Yes
OS Platform and Distribution: COS on GCP (Host), Ubuntu 18.04 (Docker)
TensorFlow installed from: pip
TensorFlow version: 1.10.1
Bazel version: N/A
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0/7.2
GPU model and memory: K80c, 12GiB
Exact command to reproduce: Used in a COCO retrained task
Mobile device: N/A

Dockerfile: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/dockerfiles/dockerfiles/nvidia.Dockerfile
